knowledge.heading: Violence Beneath Domestic Surface
knowledge.description: The text explores how violent thoughts and traumatic histories can lurk beneath seemingly ordinary domestic routines. What appears as normal family life contains disturbing undercurrents that reveal the fragility of social facades.
knowledge.pattern_connection: The unreliable first-person narration masks violence behind childlike wonder, creating dramatic irony that exposes the gap between surface domesticity and underlying menace.

device_examples.quote: I wish you were all dead
device_examples.effect: Reveals shocking violent fantasies presented matter-of-factly, showing how disturbing thoughts hide beneath normal interactions.

device_examples.quote: Never can tell what'll grow on
device_examples.effect: Creates sinister implications about the Blackwood property while Merricat remains oblivious to the dark suggestions.
